p.k: Blood Trail A tiny clue leads investigators to the unlikely man behind the murder of 22-year-old Theresa Wesolowski, who was found stabbed 46 times in Germantown in 1999
Texas Teen Love Triangle When the body of a beautiful Texas school girl is discovered, rumours buzz around the high school that a killer is walking the halls
South African Strangler Detectives get to work on a shocking case when a mass grave of women is discovered just outside of Johannesburg, South Africa

n.u: On The Case With Paula Zahn

p.n: On The Case With Paula Zahn VII (11)
p.k: 73% New. A Killer Among Friends When a teenager is found savagely murdered, police must retrace her last steps alive to identify her killer

n.u: On The Case With Paula Zahn

p.n: On The Case With Paula Zahn VII (3)
p.k: 73% Gone in an Instant Police are left baffled as young women continue to disappear out of their Kansas City area apartments. Paula Zahn investigates
New. The Barefoot Killer Years after Carolyn Krizan-Wilson's husband was shot by a mysterious burglar, her dementia leads her to reveal strange clues
New. Intent to Kill Jack Jessee's battle against cancer is cut short when he's stabbed at home. This was no random robbery, yet all the suspects have cast-iron alibis
He Came For Me Detectives reveal how DNA evidence led them to 15-year-old Nanine Grimes' killer, 25 years after she was stabbed more than 80 times in her home
Snuff Film Killer When the body of 41-year-old Marsha Spicer is discovered in Missouri, police discover her links to an ex-con who had a fantasy to make a snuff film
The Killer Nurse At hospitals in New Jersey and Pennsylvania, patients are mysteriously dying. Then a rumour spreads that a serial killer is at work
New. Watford Happy Valley actress Katherine Kelly examines the tragic case of Anne Cook, who was stabbed to death by Leon Amos while she was out walking her dog in Watford
82% A Fighting Chance Tulsa detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers, when an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot 16 times
78% The Moors Murders A look at the crimes of Myra Hindley and Ian Brady, featuring interviews with the family of Keith Bennett, who are still campaigning to find his body
78% A hard-hitting look at the murder of Rachel Nickell, who was sexually assaulted and murdered in front of her two-year-old son on Wimbledon Common in 1992
The Night Of Betrayal Durham couple George and Christina Button lived a happy life, but Christina was secretly mounting up debts
No Sleep for the Wicked True crime documentary series following determined investigators as they piece together events during the critical 24-hour window after a crime
Mr LA When a young man is shot dead at a house party, Lt Joe Kenda must interview countless suspects until a weird clue leads him to a self-styled gangster
New. The Other Woman The police send a salesman undercover when the girlfriend of their colleague goes shopping for a hit man - but the operation quickly
The House on Canyon Road Detectives uncover a scheming family and a decades-old murder plot when a dismembered skeleton is unearthed in a Seattle backyard
Constance Clark The chilling story of an Atlanta woman who masterminded a plot to have her husband killed in an effort to cash in on a life insurance policy
New. The Texas Cadet Murders When a teenage girl is found beaten and shot to death in Texas, the pressure is on police to figure out who she is, who killed her and why
